result.eng: The contract should be looked at closely again.

result.html: Ba cheart dom imeacht anoisI should leave now.
result.ponchtml: Ba ċeart dom imeaċt anoisI should leave now.

result.eng: He should be at home instead of drinking in pubs.
result.ga: Ba cheart dó bheith sa bhaile in áit bheith ag ól i dtithe tábhairne
result.orig: Ba cheart dó bheith sa bhaile in áit bheith ag ól i dtithe tábhairne

result.ponchtml: Ba ċeart dó ḃeiṫ sa ḃaile in áit ḃeiṫ ag ól i dtiṫe táḃairneHe should be at home instead of drinking in pubs.

result.eng: Anybody looking for a job in Raidió na Gaeltachta should speak good Irish.
result.ga: Ba cheart Gaeilge mhaith a bheith ag an té atá ag iarraidh poist ar Raidió na Gaeltachta
result.orig: Ba cheart Gaeilge mhaith a bheith ag an té atá ag iarraidh poist ar Raidió na Gaeltachta

result.eng: Anybody who spent so much time in the Gaeltacht should speak good Irish.
result.ga: Ba cheart go mbeadh Gaeilge mhaith ag an té a chaith an oiread sin ama sa Ghaeltacht

result.ponchtml: Ba ċeart go mbeaḋ Gaeilge ṁaiṫ ag an té a ċaiṫ an oiread sin ama sa ĠaeltaċtAnybody who spent so much time in the Gaeltacht should speak good Irish.

result.eng: He should be home by now for he left this house an hour ago.
result.ga: Ba cheart go mbeadh sé sa bhaile anois nó d'fhág sé an teach seo uair an chloig ó shin

result.eng: We should build on that goodwill.

result.eng: The parliament will have the right to amend the budget.

result.eng: You have the right to get a lawyer.

result.eng: The company should have notified us of this this six months ago.

result.eng: The soup should be ready for the lunchtime rush.

result.eng: He thought he should recognize his voice.
